channel.title: attack.resource_development on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.resource_development on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Suspicious VHD Image Download From Browser
item.description: Malware can use mountable Virtual Hard Disk .vhd file to encapsulate payloads and evade security controls

item.title: FoggyWeb Backdoor DLL Loading
item.description: Detects DLL image load activity as used by FoggyWeb backdoor loader

item.title: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
item.description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444

item.title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
item.description: Detects a command used by conti to find volume shadow backups

item.title: ProxyLogon MSExchange OabVirtualDirectory
item.description: Detects specific patterns found after a successful ProxyLogon exploitation in relation to a Commandlet invocation of Set-OabVirtualDirectory

item.title: Suspicious Keyboard Layout Load
item.description: Detects the keyboard preload installation with a suspicious keyboard layout, e.g. Chinese, Iranian or Vietnamese layout load in user session on systems maintained by US staff only

item.title: Usage of Sysinternals Tools
item.description: Detects the usage of Sysinternals Tools due to accepteula key being added to Registry

item.title: Program Executions in Suspicious Folders
item.description: Detects program executions in suspicious non-program folders related to malware or hacking activity

item.title: Relevant Anti-Virus Event
item.description: This detection method points out highly relevant Antivirus events

item.title: CVE-2021-1675 Print Spooler Exploitation Filename Pattern
item.description: Detects the default filename used in PoC code against print spooler vulnerability CVE-2021-1675

item.title: HybridConnectionManager Service Installation
item.description: Detects the installation of the Azure Hybrid Connection Manager service to allow remote code execution from Azure function.

item.title: PurpleSharp Indicator
item.description: Detects the execution of the PurpleSharp adversary simulation tool

item.title: Suspicious PowerShell Mailbox Export to Share
item.description: Detects a PowerShell New-MailboxExportRequest that exports a mailbox to a local share, as used in ProxyShell exploitations

item.title: Windows Update Error
item.description: Windows Update get some error Check if need a 0-days KB
